Class Bounds

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.canvas.Bounds

public class Bounds
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class representing a rectangular bounds.

Returns the x-value of the right-hand edge of this bounds.

bottomY

public double bottomY()
Returns the y-value of the bottom edge of this bounds.

inside

public boolean inside(int px,
                      int py)
Returns true only if the specified point (px,py) is inside this rectangular bounding box. Note that points on the perimeter are considered "inside" (e.g. new Bounds(0, 0, 100, 50).inside(100, 50) returns true).

setPosition

public void setPosition(double x,
                        double y)
Convenience method for setting the (x,y) position of this Bounds object. Equivalent to this: bounds.x = x; bounds.y = y;.
